name: A Casual Stroll (Bazodan, Speldesign - Skurup/Fridhem)
description:
You're an old man having a casual stroll somewhere!

At your age it's hard to figure out where you are, thought it might be some sort of warehouse, there's a lot of boxes here. 

No clue how you ended up here!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my fall project which is a platformer  prototype I made using unity and visual scripting.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Controlls;
A = Left
D = Right
Space = Jump
R = Reset

If you wanna Exit the game you simply; alt + F4
